class_notes: (Same as CHN 279W 1, EAS 279W 1)  This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course introduces students to the history, culture, society, and politics of China since 1976 through an exploration of the continuities and discontinuities knitting pre and post 1976 China.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4708, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 9:40-10:55a, Instructor: J. Fu, Status: Closed
